Each of - * these subpackages has its own service-provider (SPI) subpackage, - * the contents of which can be used to extend the platform's default - * implementations or to construct alternative implementations. + * the {@link java.nio.charset} package, the channel and selector APIs + * in the {@link java.nio.channels} package, and the files and path APIs + * in the {@link java.nio.file} package.
